subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Carlos Sastre holds a lead of 1 minute and 34 seconds over Cadel Evans, who usually thrives in time trials, heading into the penultimate stage of the 95th Tour de France.
snippet: Carlos Sastre holds a lead of 1 minute and 34 seconds over Cadel Evans, who usually thrives in time trials, heading into the penultimate stage of the 95th Tour de France.
